description: This file defines an AuthProvider class that manages user authentication state, including login, logout, and session restore functionalities, using Flutter's ChangeNotifier for state management.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: A provider class managing user authentication state, handling login, logout, and session restoration, notifying listeners on state changes.

methods.name: AuthProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializing the AuthProvider with an optional ApiClient.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login via API, stores the token and user info in shared preferences.

methods.name: restore
methods.description: Restores user session from stored shared preferences if available.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears user session data from memory and shared preferences.
